org.spongepowered.api.item

Interface Enchantment


  • public interface Enchantment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBeAppliedByTable(ItemStack stack)
      Test if this enchantment can be applied to an ItemStack by the Enchanting Table.
      boolean canBeAppliedToStack(ItemStack stack)
      Test if this enchantment can be applied to an ItemStack.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Gets the id of this enchantment.
      int getMaximumEnchantabilityForLevel(int level)
      Get the maximum item enchantibility for this level to be normally added by enchanting tables.
      int getMaximumLevel()
      Get the maximum level of this enchantment normally allowed.
      int getMinimumEnchantabilityForLevel(int level)
      Get the minimum item enchantibility for this level to be normally added by enchanting tables.
      int getMinimumLevel()
      Get the minimum level of this enchantment allowed where it is present.
      int getWeight()
      Get the weight of the enchantment.
      boolean isCompatibleWith(Enchantment ench)
      Test if this enchantment can be applied along with another enchantment.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the id of this enchantment.

        Ex. Minecraft registers Efficiency as "minecraft:efficiency".

        Returns:
        The id

      • getWeight

        int getWeight()
        Get the weight of the enchantment.

        Higher values are more common. This value is also used in the repair cost calculation.

        Returns:
        The weight

      • getMinimumLevel

        int getMinimumLevel()
        Get the minimum level of this enchantment allowed where it is present.
        Returns:
        The minimum level

      • getMaximumLevel

        int getMaximumLevel()
        Get the maximum level of this enchantment normally allowed.
        Returns:
        The maximum level

      • getMinimumEnchantabilityForLevel

        int getMinimumEnchantabilityForLevel(int level)
        Get the minimum item enchantibility for this level to be normally added by enchanting tables.
        Parameters:
        level - Enchantment level
        Returns:
        Minimum enchantability

      • getMaximumEnchantabilityForLevel

        int getMaximumEnchantabilityForLevel(int level)
        Get the maximum item enchantibility for this level to be normally added by enchanting tables.
        Parameters:
        level - Enchantment level
        Returns:
        Maximum enchantability

      • canBeAppliedToStack

        boolean canBeAppliedToStack(ItemStack stack)
        Test if this enchantment can be applied to an ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack to check
        Returns:
        Whether this enchantment can be applied

      • canBeAppliedByTable

        boolean canBeAppliedByTable(ItemStack stack)
        Test if this enchantment can be applied to an ItemStack by the Enchanting Table.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack to check
        Returns:
        Whether this enchantment can be applied by the Enchanting Table

      • isCompatibleWith

        boolean isCompatibleWith(Enchantment ench)
        Test if this enchantment can be applied along with another enchantment.
        Parameters:
        ench - Enchantment to test compatibility with
        Returns:
        Whether these enchantments are compatible
